Text.Page:
Ah, yes, I remember those: "the colorful tuwangi look without the stinky froggy smell." Those hats took lots of bloodhide, toira fibers...and one perfectly spherical fruit.

Sadly, the fruit has been harvested to extinction. You can't find them anywhere! Don't waste your time looking."But I have one."

Wow! How long have you been holding onto this?

No, not important. All I really need to know is which color hat you want!"Well..."

That perfectly round fruit just doesn't exist. I don't even think you can get them at auction any more.

If you don't already have the fruit, don't waste your time gathering the other components.
